venue.address_1: The riverside plaza across from market basket 11 kimball drive suit 124
venue.name: The NH Dog Company

item.description:
Hi everyone!  Lets get together and play!  The play place out back will be open and the inside will be nice and cool to play too.   The store will be closed so we can just have some fun!

I also wanted to let all the pug owners that are looking to get their pug groomed I am offering a $25 dollar special.  That will include nails, wrinkles, ears,  a brush out and a bath. I will be grooming the pugs myself.. I attended daltons school of dog grooming so i am a certified groomer..   If you are interested give me a call.  : )   thanks again and see you in September!

group.name: Manchester New Hampshire pug/small dog meet up group

item.name: Let's play!
